column6: "SHE LIES WITH ANGELS" pts. 3 & 4 (of 5) The X-Men find themselves caught between an ages-old family feud, with two young lovers - one human and one mutant - trapped on either side. 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.25 (each)
column8: | writer:Chuck Austen | writer:Stan Lee | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki
